title: Acceptability of new energy vehicles set to rise by end of decade: Survey
description: A recent survey reveals that most new car buyers in India are willing to consider new energy vehicles (NEVs) by 2030, even paying up to 49% more for electric vehicles. The positive outlook is driven by expanding EV charging infrastructure and government policies, but challenges remain compared to China's dominance in the sector.
